channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other FW6 Surface problem, 6th October
item.description:

item.title: TMC - Defects - Other problem, 6th October
item.description:
Please clean out the gully as agreed with Eggy.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Ash tree at storm risk, 6th October
item.description:
There is a very large Ash tree alongside a Gas Sub station. It is ajacent to to Pickwick and 42 New Barn Close. Both properties occupied by Senior Citizens. Should the tree suffer serious storm damage, the Gas Substation could be dangerously affected.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 42, New Barn Close, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Ash Tree located on Highway land

item.title: Large surface of the road coming away, 6th October
item.description:
There is two large areas of the road coming away and very uneven which can cause damage to vehicles when driven over
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Swindon Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 12 inch pothole on Hannah Close, 6th October
item.description:
18 metres from junction with Mottershead Drive by the parking space on the south side of the road. It's quite large and as deep as a golf ball. There's another slightly shallower one adjacent to it.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hannah Place, Innsworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain making thud when cars go over, 6th October
item.description:
By Stoke orchard church bus stop & going on for weeks

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Stoke Road, Stoke Orchard, Cheltenham

item.title: Dead fox, 6th October
item.description:
Dead fox on the corner of Hucclecote Road/Porchester Road, just as you turn right into Porchester. It is in the lavender bushes just after the zebra crossing. Looks recently deceased. I saw this at about 9:15 this morning
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 62, Hucclecote Road, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lots of potholes at the end of hall road, 6th October
item.description:
Multiple potholes which are getting worse at the end of hall road - outside numbers 9&11. Road desperately needs resurfacing!
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Hall Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
